DESCRIPTION: #yToxic creatures lose HP at the end of the round.

Your #yPokemon have a limited amount of #yStamina. The numbers in parentheses represent the #yStamina cost of each move. #yPokemon that run out of #yStamina can no longer battle. NL #yStamina can be restored at campfires and by progressing to a new Act.
#yBurned creatures receive increased damage from attacks.
#yWaterlogged cards are #yUnplayable and #yRetain. After being #yRetained, #yWaterlogged cards become #yDamp.
#yDamp cards #yRetain and #yExhaust. After being #yRetained for 2 turns, #yDamp is removed from the card.
Whenever you play a card, the afflicted creature loses HP.
#yScorched cards are #yEthereal. Whenever you play a #yScorched card, take #b2 damage.
#ySlowed creatures take more damage from attacks for each card played in a turn.
#yShadow-Cursed cards are #yEthereal. They deal #b50% less damage but gain #b50% more #yBlock.
